name: Alexander the Great
what_did:
Alexander became king at just 20 years old.
He led his army across Asia and conquered one of the biggest empires ever.
He never lost a battle and spread Greek ideas far and wide.
why_matters:
Alexander helped mix cultures from East and West.
He founded many cities and made Greek learning important in many lands.
People studied his tactics and stories for centuries.
